issue.title: [build cop] sdformat trusty failed to featch package from archive

content.raw: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ is reachable but http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/l/linux/linux-libc-dev_3.13.0-107.154_amd64.deb is not. I notice there is a newer version http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/l/linux/linux-libc-dev_3.13.0-108.155_amd64.deb. Maybe the archive was being updated when this job was running, and the job failed because of it?
content.html: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ is reachable but http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/l/linux/linux-libc-dev_3.13.0-107.154_amd64.deb is not. I notice there is a newer version http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/l/linux/linux-libc-dev_3.13.0-108.155_amd64.deb. Maybe the archive was being updated when this job was running, and the job failed because of it?
